summary: The meeting covered two main topics: an issue with the intake tool validation and a proposal for implementing value streams and governance structure based on the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS). Adrian presented a detailed framework for running steering committee meetings using the EOS Level 10 meeting format.
decisions: Laura to handle intake tool validation issues in a separate meeting
Agreement to implement EOS-based meeting structure for steering committee

action_items.task: Schedule follow-up meeting with Jay, Charles, and Louis regarding intake tool issues
Establish metrics for each value stream

concerns: Intake tool validations not working properly
QC time increasing due to validation bypass
Need for better alignment between metrics and business goals
michael_priorities: Reducing need for pull approach to get people involved
Having team members take ownership of performance metrics
Wanting solutions to be driven by team members
commitments: Laura to follow up within 20 minutes after meeting
Adrian to help implement EOS structure without need for external implementers
